context: In 2015, PTC acquired ThingWorx (IoT platform) and expanded into Internet of Things, differentiating from traditional CAD/PLM competitors. This strategic pivot added IoT and AR (Vuforia acquisition in 2015) to PTC's portfolio. Core CAD competition between Creo, CATIA, NX, and Inventor continued. The PLM market saw Teamcenter and Windchill as primary competitors. PTC's IoT expansion addressed manufacturing digital transformation.
